body.name: MAM Perfect Night Baby Pacifier, Patented Nipple, Glows in the Dark, 6-16 Months, Girl, 2 Count (Pack of 1)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 17. Order within 4 hrs 31 mins
features: GLOWS IN THE DARK: These pacifiers for baby have a glow in the dark functionality, making it easy for you to locate quickly at night without any stumbling and searching, helping your baby sleep better.
VENTILATED & COMFORTABLE SHIELD: These cute pacifiers for babies have a curved sterilizing shield with openings to keep baby comfortable, prevent moisture build-up, and allow baby’s skin to breathe.
FLEXIBLE SHAPE FOR 6+ MONTH BABY : The SkinSoft nipple on these pacifiers is 60% thinner and 4x more flexible than average, exerting less pressure on the mouth in order to avoid jaw deformations.
SELF - STERILIZING CASE: Add water and pop into the microwave to sterilize MAM silicone pacifiers 6+ months in just 3 minutes and store in case for at home and travel to protect the pacifiers.
HIGH QUALITY: Approved by 94% of babies*, our 100% BPA & BPS free orthodontic silicone pacifiers meet or exceed US safety standards and are extremely durable, while being soft and flexible.
body.description: No more frustration trying to find your lost pacifiers at night! This pacifier glows in the dark, making it easy for baby and parent to find in the evening hours. Specially designed with your little one’s teeth and jaw in mind, the MAM Perfect Pacifier is clinically proven* to reduce the risk of open bite and increased overbite later in life. With a 60% thinner neck and 4 times more flexible nipple** than a regular pacifier, you can be assured that your little one’s favorite binky is safe for their development as it puts less pressure on their jaw and teeth. MAM’s medically engineered nipples feature life-like, SkinSoft textured silicone that feels more natural, just like mom. With multiple nipple and shield sizes to pick from, MAM nipples are easily accepted by babies of all ages, with 94% nipple acceptance among babies tested***. Babies simply love the ease and comfort of latching onto MAM nipples. Sterilize baby’s MAM pacifier in the microwave using the convenient MAM self-sterilizing storage case. Pacifiers kept in the closed box will remain disinfected for up to 48 hours: Fill pacifier case with water. Place pacifier in the pacifier case with the nipple facing down. Follow pacifier package instructions for microwave setting. Cool completely before use. *Y. Wagner, R. Heinrich-Weltzien, “Effect of a thinneck pacifier on primary dentition: a randomized controlled trial”, Orthodontics & Craniofacial Research, Volume 19, Issue 3, pages 127–136, August 2016. **Scientific reports from Wild Hi-Precision institute verify: the MAM Perfect’s teat neck is on average 60% thinner; test series by the University Clinic of Dentistry Vienna confirm: it is also on average 4 times more flexible than comparable pacifiers. (Between: 32% – 83% thinner / 1.1 – 19.5 times more flexible than regular silicone pacifiers). *** Market Research 2009-2017, tested with 1,508 babies.

productInformation.name: Care instructions
productInformation.value: ‎Inspect carefully before each use. Pull the pacifier in all directions. Throw away at the first signs of damage or weakness. Only use dedicated pacifier holders tested to EN 12586. Never attach other ribbons or cords to a pacifier, your child may be strangled by them. Do not leave a pacifier in direct sunlight or near a source of heat or leave in sterilizing solution for longer than recommended, as this may weaken the nipple.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Parenting is hard. We make stuff to make it easier. MAM knows that being a parent is not always easy, so we make products that are smart and simple to use. For over 45 years we've been obsessed with making innovative pacifiers, bottles, cups, teethers, and toothbrushes, providing babies with optimal care at all stages. MAM Perfect Night Orthodontic Pacifier 2 Nighttime Glow-in-the-Dark Pacifiers MAM's BPA/BPS-free MAM Perfect Night Pacifiers have been developed by leading pediatric dentists and developmental psychologists to provide maximum comfort and style for babies ages 6+ months*. MAM’s cutting-edge pacifiers combine technological innovation and trendsetting design to help give babies a healthy start in life. *Developed in conjunction with the International Children’s Medical Research Society Perfect nipple reduces the risk of misaligned teeth Anti-slip texture helps nipple stay comfortably in baby’s mouth Curved shield allows the pacifier to sit comfortably on baby’s face Shield openings allow air to circulate and baby’s skin to breathe Glow in the dark feature makes it easy for baby to find at night
Air holes in shield allow baby's skin to breathe Extra thin and flexible nipple allows room for teeth to grow SkinSoft silicone nipple offers a familiar feel Easy to find at night

MAM Perfect Pacifier MAM Perfect Night Pacifier MAM Air Pacifier MAM Original Pacifier MAM Original Night Pacifier 6+ Nipple Size ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ SkinSoft Textured Silicone Nipple ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Textured Shield (Reduces Skin Irritation) ✓ ✓ Extra Air Exposure (For Sensitive Skin) ✓ Extra Thin & Flexible Orthodontic Nipple ✓ ✓ Quantity 2 2 2 2 2 Includes Self-Sterilizing Box ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Glows in the Dark ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Glow in the dark is great at night
reviews.reviewText: Love these! I thought the glow in the dark would be bright on my baby’s face, but it doesnt seem to bother her. These are great for finding them when they fall on the floor. I also love that they have room for teeth to grow safely. I only buy these from now on!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are the only pacifiers my daughter will take. She loves the thin nipple design and refuses all others. They're very durable too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Who'd have thought?
reviews.reviewText: I'm a nanny for a two year-old that just uses her binky for nap and bedtime, so I didn't expect this purchase to be any big deal. However, for some reason, everything about these pacifiers seemed to check all the boxes for her! She loves the bunny and the star, she likes the "bite" of the silicone and she loovvveess the fact that it flows in the dark! Sometimes it doesn't even go in her mouth, she just looks at it! As I said, who'd have thought?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My baby loves these. Unfortunately so does our puppy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Babygirl loves them
reviews.reviewText: I love the venting around the mouth its perfect for my chunky punky

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2019
reviews.reviewText: These are simply the best. All three of my children used this brand and I have nothing but glowing things to say. My nearly 2 year old still uses them, and I will buy these again. They are cute, hold up very well, and are easy to clean. I can't think of a single thing I dislike (besides how often I buy them due to my child losing them). I recommend these to everyone!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my 6 months baby

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Different for every baby
reviews.reviewText: Not our baby’s favorite but works when she’s desperate. When her gums are particularly sore from teething and she wants to chew, this isn’t ideal because the base more flat compared to other pacifiers, so there isn’t as much of a bite. But beggars can’t be choosers!
No he encontrado esa marca en mejor precio, son de una excelente calidad
